summary: This is a small pack of spells for seeing in the dark and another vision type of spells not sure what another vision spell will be coming I am looking into that at the moment there is only one spell and that is nighteye.
descriptionHtml:
his is a small pack of spells for seeing in the dark and another vision type's of spells not sure what another vision spell will be coming I am looking into that hopefully there will be nighteye in different colours but that the moment there is only one spell and that is nighteye as a spell and it lets you see just like a khajiit and you can get it in some magic shops and in some loot chest also you can find it if you follow the mage quest line


[b][u][size=4]How to Install[/size][/u][/b]

- To install this mod, simply download the main file and put the contents into the Skyrim data folder. Then active via launcher but
if I was you I would use the Nexus Mod Manager or mod organizer. Installing
with Nexus Mod Manager may be easier for some individuals, but it is
entirely down to preference.

[size=4][u][b]UPDATING[/b][/u][/size]

- Follow the install instructions, then merge or overwrite the files in the
Data folder. Then proceed to activate the mod via the checklist on your
Fallout New Vegas launcher.

[b][u][size=4]UNINSTALL

[/size][/u][/b]To uninstall Just del the esp less you are using mod organizer or
nexus mod manager then just use the uninstall button with the program.

[size=4][b][u]PLAINS FOR THE FURTHER

[/u][/b][/size]As I was saying just above I want to add nighteye in different colours and different visions of detectlife  life and other vision types of spells


[b][size=4][u]BUG REPORTING[/u]

[/size][/b]Please let me know if you find any problems like mobs stuck in the floor
just leave a comment in the post or click on the contact button.
